productEmsList.title: GHC™ Autopilot Instrument
productEmsList.tooltip: GHC autopilot instrument is included with GHC selection. If you select "None Included," it is the Reactor 40 product only.

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: The Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot is the most responsive autopilot offered by Garmin. This autopilot minimizes heading error, course deviation & much more.
seoAttributes.seoTitle: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot with GHC™ 20 | Marine Autopilot
seoAttributes.title: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot with GHC™ 20

010-00705-19.pvName: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot with GHC™ 20 Autopilot Instrument

seo.ogDescription: The Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot is the most responsive autopilot offered by Garmin. This autopilot minimizes heading error, course deviation & much more.
seo.title: Reactor™ 40 Hydraulic Autopilot with GHC™ 20 | Marine Autopilot

inTheBoxTab.content:
• Reactor 40 CCU (Course Computer Unit)
  • GHC™ 20 helm control display
  • ECU (Electronic Control Unit)
  • ECU power cable
  • Interconnect cable
  • Shadow Drive
  • Buzzer
  • NMEA 2000® drop cables (2 meters)
  • NMEA 2000 power cable
  • NMEA 2000 T-connectors
  • Male and female terminators
  • Documentation
inTheBoxTab.title: In the Box

overviewTab.title: Overview

specsTab.content:
• Unit dimensions, WxHxD: 4.3 " x 4.4 " x 1.9 " (10.9 x 11.2 x 4.8 cm)
  • Display resolution, WxH: 320 x 240 pixels
  • Display type: QVGA color LCD display
  • NMEA output: NMEA 2000
  • Supply voltage: 10V to 20V
  • Operating temperature: -15° C to 70 C° (5° F to 158° F)

GHC 20 Specifications
